[2]You don't look like my brother. 
[3]I came from a test tube. 
[4]I do! 
[5]It's Jack! 
[6]My daddy doesn't know my name. 
[7]I'm Jack, damn it.
dialogues.DOCTOR SEDUKU:
[1]What we should do is easy and simple. No more dairy, no more wheat, no more sugar. 
[2]She can have vegetables and f-r-ruits. 
[3]Fr-r-ruits, yes. 
[4]Mangos, pineapple... 
[5]No, no. 
[6]Are you okay? Would you like to come on the table?
dialogues.BILLIE JOE:
[1]Shut up, Tom Selleck. 
[2]Graham, hey, what's up? 
[3]How you doing, man? Great show. I'm inspired. I want to write a song right now. 
[4]Let's go get a drink. 
[5]You coming? 
[6]You got a song on Glee? That's killer, man. That's so much money, that's good for all of us.
